description.english: Obtained all achievements.
description.german: Alle Erfolge erlangt.
description.french: Tous les succès obtenus.
description.italian: Hai ottenuto tutti gli obiettivi.
description.spanish: Has conseguido todos los logros.
description.japanese: 全ての実績を獲得せよ

description.english: Successfully perform the Reverse Wind technique.
description.german: Führen Sie die Technik des Gegenwinds erfolgreich aus.
description.french: Réussissez la technique du vent inversé.
description.italian: Esegui  la tecnica del Vento avverso.
description.spanish: Ejecuta correctamente la técnica Viento invertido.
description.japanese: 裏風を会得せよ

description.english: Successfully perform the Furious Wind technique.
description.german: Führen Sie die Technik des Zornigen Windes erfolgreich aus.
description.french: Réussissez la technique du vent furieux.
description.italian: Esegui la tecnica del Vento furioso.
description.spanish: Ejecuta correctamente la técnica Viento violento.
description.japanese: 疾風を会得せよ

displayName.spanish: No te fíes ni de tu sombra

description.english: Successfully perform the Shadowless Footsteps technique.
description.german: Führen Sie die Technik der Schattenlosen Schritte erfolgreich aus.
description.french: Réussissez la technique des traces de pas invisibles.
description.italian: Esegui la tecnica dei Passi senza ombra.
description.spanish: Ejecuta correctamente la técnica Pisadas sin sombra.
description.japanese: 無影脚を会得せよ

description.english: Successfully perform the Flying Swallow technique.
description.german: Führen Sie die Technik der Fliegenden Schwalbe erfolgreich aus.
description.french: Réussissez la technique de l'hirondelle en vol.
description.italian: Esegui la tecnica della Rondine Volante.
description.spanish: Ejecuta correctamente la técnica Golondrina voladora.
description.japanese: 飛燕を会得せよ

description.english: Successfully perform the Flying Bird Flip technique.
description.german: Führen Sie die Technik des Flugvogelsprungs erfolgreich aus.
description.french: Réussissez la technique du saut d'oiseau.
description.italian: Esegui la tecnica dell'Uccello Volante.
description.spanish: Ejecuta correctamente la técnica Voltereta ave voladora.
description.schinese: 成功施展飞鸟翻转之术。
description.japanese: 飛鳥返しを会得せよ

description.english: Successfully perform the Obliteration Technique.
description.german: Führen Sie die Auslöschungstechnik erfolgreich aus.
description.french: Réussissez la technique de l'anéantissement.
description.italian: Esegui la Tecnica dell'Annientamento.
description.spanish: Ejecuta correctamente la técnica de la Obliteración.
description.japanese: 滅却を会得せよ

description.english: Successfully perform the Ultimate Technique.
description.german: Führen Sie die Ultimative Technik erfolgreich aus.
description.french: Réussissez la technique ultime.
description.italian: Esegui la Tecnica Finale.
description.spanish: Ejecuta correctamente la técnica Definitiva.
description.japanese: 絶技を会得せよ

description.english: Successfully perform the Ultimate Guidance technique.
description.german: Führen Sie die Ultimative Führung erfolgreich aus.
description.french: Réussissez la technique de l'ultime conseil.
description.italian: Esegui la Tecnica dell'Ultimo Consiglio.
description.spanish: Ejecuta correctamente la técnica Guía final.
description.schinese: 成功施展绝技引导之术。
description.tchinese: 成功施展絕技引導之術。
description.japanese: 絶技引導を会得せよ

description.english: Successfully perform the Counter Attack technique.
description.german: Führen Sie die Technik des Gegenangriffs erfolgreich aus.
description.french: Réussissez la technique de la contre-attaque.
description.italian: Esegui la tecnica del Contrattacco.
description.spanish: Ejecuta correctamente la técnica Contraataque.
description.japanese: 捌きを会得せよ

description.english: Successfully perform the Unrivaled Soaring technique.
description.german: Führen Sie die Technik des Unübertroffenen Aufstiegs erfolgreich aus.
description.french: Réussissez la technique de l'envol unique.
description.italian: Esegui la tecnica della Planata Ineguagliabile.
description.spanish: Ejecuta correctamente la técnica Ascenso inigualable.
description.japanese: 無双脚を会得せよ

description.english: Successfully perform the Invisible Path technique.

description.italian: Esegui la tecnica del Sentiero Invisibile.
description.spanish: Ejecuta correctamente la técnica Senda invisible.

description.spanish: Ejecuta correctamente la técnica Salto de Izuna.
description.japanese: 飯綱落としを会得せよ

description.spanish: Ejecuta correctamente la técnica Caída de guillotina.
description.japanese: 首切り投げを会得せよ

description.english: Successfully perform the Art of the Inferno Ninpo.

description.italian: Esegui l'Arte dell'Inferno.
description.spanish: Ejecuta correctamente el Arte del Infierno.

description.italian: Esegui l'Arte delle Lame volanti.

description.schinese: 成功施展忍术“破魔裂风刃”。
description.tchinese: 成功施展忍術「破魔裂風刃」。
description.japanese: 忍法、破魔裂風刃を会得せよ

description.english: Clear Hero Play Style or PATH OF THE ACOLYTE.
description.german: Schließen Sie den „Held-Modus“ oder den „WEG DES AKOLYTHEN“ ab.
description.french: Terminez le jeu en mode héros ou sur la VOIE DE L'ACOLYTE.
description.italian: Completa la partita nello Stile dell'eroe o sul SENTIERO DEL SEGUACE.
description.spanish: Debes terminar la SENDA DEL HÉROE o la SENDA DEL ACÓLITO.
description.schinese: 成功通关最强之忍或下忍难易度。
description.tchinese: 成功通關最強之忍或下忍難易度。
description.japanese: 最強の忍または忍の道をクリア

description.english: Clear the game on the PATH OF THE WARRIOR.
description.german: Schließen Sie den „WEG DES KRIEGERS“ ab.
description.french: Terminez le jeu sur la VOIE DU GUERRIER.
description.italian: Completa la partita sul SENTIERO DEL GUERRIERO.
description.spanish: Debes terminar la SENDA DEL GUERRERO.
description.japanese: 強者の道をクリア

description.english: Clear the game on the PATH OF THE MENTOR.
description.german: Schließen Sie den „WEG DES MENTORS“ ab.
description.french: Terminez le jeu sur la VOIE DU MENTOR.
description.italian: Completa la partita sul SENTIERO DEL MENTORE.
description.spanish: Debes terminar la SENDA DEL MENTOR.
description.japanese: 悟りの道をクリア

displayName.french: Vers la maîtrise de l'art du ninja
displayName.spanish: Este es mi camino del ninja

description.english: Clear the game on the PATH OF THE MASTER NINJA.
description.german: Schließen Sie den „WEG DES NINJA-MEISTERS“ ab.
description.french: Terminez le jeu sur la VOIE DU MAÎTRE NINJA.
description.italian: Completa la partita sul SENTIERO DEL MAESTRO NINJA.
description.spanish: Debes terminar la SENDA DEL MAESTRO NINJA.
description.japanese: 超忍への道をクリア

description.english: Earn the MASTER NINJA rank in all chapters on CHAPTER CHALLENGE difficulty PATH OF THE ACOLYTE.
description.german: Erreichen Sie den Rang „NINJA-MEISTER“ in allen Kapiteln der „KAPITEL-HERAUSFORDERUNGEN“ auf der Schwierigkeitsstufe „WEG DES AKOLYTHEN“.
description.french: Obtiens le rang de MAÎTRE NINJA dans tous les chapitres en difficulté CHALLENGE CHAPITRE sur la VOIE DE L'ACOLYTE.
description.italian: Ottieni il grado MAESTRO NINJA in tutti i capitoli a difficoltà SFIDA CAPITOLO sul SENTIERO DEL SEGUACE.
description.spanish: Logra el rango de MAESTRO NINJA en todos los capítulos del RETO DE CAPÍTULO en la dificultad SENDA DEL ACÓLITO.
description.schinese: 在挑战章节中以难易度“下忍”在所有章节获得超忍评价。
description.tchinese: 在挑戰章節中以難易度「下忍」在所有章節獲得超忍評價。
description.japanese: CHAPTER CHALLENGE 難易度「忍の道」全チャプターで超忍の評価を獲得

description.english: Earn the MASTER NINJA rank in all chapters on CHAPTER CHALLENGE difficulty PATH OF THE WARRIOR.
description.german: Erreichen Sie den Rang „NINJA-MEISTER“ in allen Kapiteln der „KAPITEL-HERAUSFORDERUNGEN“ auf der Schwierigkeitsstufe „WEG DES KRIEGERS“.
description.french: Obtiens le rang de MAÎTRE NINJA dans tous les chapitres en difficulté CHALLENGE CHAPITRE sur la VOIE DU GUERRIER.

description.spanish: Logra el rango de MAESTRO NINJA en todos los capítulos del RETO DE CAPÍTULO en la dificultad SENDA DEL GUERRERO.
description.schinese: 在挑战章节中以难易度“中忍”在所有章节获得超忍评价。
description.tchinese: 在挑戰章節中以難易度「中忍」在所有章節獲得超忍評價。
description.japanese: CHAPTER CHALLENGE 難易度「強者の道」全チャプターで超忍の評価を獲得

description.english: Earn the MASTER NINJA rank in all chapters on CHAPTER CHALLENGE difficulty PATH OF THE MENTOR.

description.japanese: CHAPTER CHALLENGE 難易度「悟りの道」全チャプターで超忍の評価を獲得

description.english: Earn the MASTER NINJA rank in all chapters on CHAPTER CHALLENGE difficulty PATH OF THE MASTER NINJA.

description.english: Obtain all of the Crystal Skulls.
description.german: Sammeln Sie alle Kristallschädel.
description.french: Obtenez tous les crânes de cristal.
description.italian: Ottieni tutti i testi di cristallo.
description.spanish: Obtén todas las calaveras de cristal.
description.japanese: すべての水晶ドクロを取得

description.english: Achieve a 100-hit combo with any weapon.
description.german: Erreichen Sie eine 100-Treffer-Kombo mit einer beliebigen Waffe.
description.french: Effectuez un combo de 100 coups avec n'importe quelle arme.
description.italian: Ottieni una combo da 100 con un'arma qualsiasi.
description.spanish: Consigue una combinación de 100 golpes con cualquier arma.
description.japanese: 100ヒットコンボを達成せよ

description.english: Defeat 1000 enemies with Hayabusa.
description.german: Besiegen Sie 1000 Feinde als Hayabusa.
description.french: Eliminez 1000 ennemis avec Hayabusa.
description.italian: Sconfiggi 1000 nemici con Hayabusa.
description.spanish: Derrota a 1000 enemigos con Hayabusa.
description.schinese: 成功以隼龙击败1000个敌人。
description.tchinese: 成功以龍隼擊敗1000個敵人。
description.japanese: ハヤブサで敵を1000体倒せ

description.spanish: Vence a 1000 enemigos usando Ayane.

description.tchinese: 成功以綾音擊敗1000個敵人。
description.japanese: あやねで敵を1000体倒せ

description.tchinese: 成功以紅葉擊敗1000個敵人。

description.german: Schließen Sie alle Tag-Missionen ab.

description.italian: Completa tutte le missioni Squadra.
